item.description: iV: The Ivy League Vegan Conference On February 15-17, 2013 Yale University will host the second Ivy League conference dedicated to exploring the academic basis for plant-based diets and building a cohesive community of activists and advocates. The conference aims to embolden and empower vegan activists in their work throughout the Ivy League, build a lasting and powerful network of colleagues, and expand and modernize the concept of veganism for the 21st century academic. We expect an attendance of approximately 100 students, alumni, and researchers from across the Ivy League. Learn more about the conference http://iv-conference.... http://www.facebook.c...

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: iV: The Ivy League Vegan Conference
